doc.after: British colonists consolidated the Tamil territory in southern India into the Madras Presidency which was integrated into British India Similarly the Tamil speaking parts of Sri Lanka joined with the other regions of the island in 1802 to form the Ceylon colony They remained in political union with India and Sri Lanka after their independence in 1947 and 1948 respectively
